bio:
Mogdurz is an Orsimer miner who may be found in Gloombound Mine.
Mogdurz can be found inside Gloombound Mine, which is found inside the orc stronghold of Narzulbur in Eastmarch.
She is often found mining ore here, and she can update the Dragonborn's map with locations of other Orc Strongholds.
name: Mogdurz
